extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite     Level 4 and registration in a PHIL Major or Medial Plan and (a minimum GPA of 2.60 in PHIL250 and PHIL257) and (6.0 units in PHIL).

basic.description: An examination of major issues in contemporary philosophy of mind. Possible topics to be considered include:  consciousness;  definitional questions (what is the mind?); mental causation; mental events; mental properties; and various theories about the nature of the mind.
basic.subject: PHIL
basic.title: Topics in Philosophy of Mind
